name: Propulsion [DEMO]
description:
[THIS IS A DEMO]

A lot of assets are still being worked on (especially sound), and there is a small number of bugs in this demo.

This is a game where you must live as long as possible against an endless amount of enemies and bosses. Fight using a gun and also a unique propulsion mechanic, allowing the player to bounce themselves or enemies either in the air or in another direction.

Made by Chadderbox: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBTnza6RHvA1wGMbIYa0LRw
